      • getSimpleDataSetIdString

        private java.lang.String getSimpleDataSetIdString(INode node)
        Gets a string representation of the data set id's contained in the cluster.
        Parameters:
        node - the cluster to query
        Returns:
        a string representation of the data set items contained in the cluster. The representation is of the form "data set item" for leaves, "data set item 1, data set item 2" for clusters of size two and "data set item 1, data set item 2, ..." for cluster with size > 2.

      • setId

        public void setId(long id)
        Description copied from interface: INode
        Sets the id of the node. Used for evaluations.
        Specified by:
        setId in interface INode

      • getDataSetIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDataSetIds()
        Description copied from interface: INode
        Gets the id(s) of the data item(s) (i.e. user or contend item) contained in this cluster from the clustered data set.
        Specified by:
        getDataSetIds in interface INode
        Returns:
        an immutable list of all data set id's of the containing data set item, which are contained in this cluster. The size of the list is equal to 1 if this node is a leaf and equal to the number of cluster instances (e.g. users) if node is the root.

      • getDataSetIds

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDataSetIds(java.util.List<java.lang.String> li)
        Gets recursively a list with all data set id's of data set items contained in this cluster.
        Parameters:
        li - the list to expand
        Returns:
        a list with all data set id's contained in the cluster
